newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's NLCF to seek 52,500T of feed wheat.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's NLCF to seek 52,500T of feed wheat.

text.p: South Korea's National Livestock Cooperatives Federation (NLCF) said on Tuesday it has invited tenders for 52,500 tonnes of feed wheat by 11.00 p.m. (0200 GMT) on Wednesday.

An NLCF official told Reuters that shipment is scheduled for January 25-February 13 if sourced from Canada, Australia and the Pacific Northwest or for January 6-25 if sourced from Europe and the U.S. Gulf.
